title: Digital Science Project: Collaborative Problem-Solving Through Online Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific terminology and digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening interaction via online discussion forums while conducting science projects in digital learning environments

learning_goals: Learners post at least three opinions related to science projects in digital discussion forums
Learners provide constructive feedback on peers' posts at least five times
Learners complete the final output of a science project based on ideas collected from discussion forums
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
